Yggdrasil: Well... Unless I'm mistaken, we know someone who comes 
from the Survivor Council.

He points his thumb at the CR where Azure is regenerating.

Yggdrasil: Asking him would definitely help us to choose, wouldn't it?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nighlight:
> 
> "If we do that , U nicron could destroy  Earth and changed the 
past" 
> said Nighlight"We must find awaay to Stop Unicrom"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: If any attempt to retreave the Matrix is made it 
> will be a joint effort. We'll be heading that effort up of course, 
> after all it is the AUTOBOT Matrix. Now as you said, it was always 
> the emergency plan to relocate a survivor council on earth, but we 
> have no way of knowing for sure if it ever happened. The 
Tripredacus 
> could have stopped that attempt. This means that we have a choice 
to 
> make and time is running thin. Do we go to the present earth of our 
> time or to Cybertron?
> > 
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang was clearly disappointed. He had hoped for the spark to 
> be 
> > on Earth.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Maybe we can send someone to the Survivor Council on

> >

imagine 
> > Cybertron in Tripred claws.
> >

> They'd 
> > just tell him to get the pit outta here while we stay behind and 
> wait 
> > for Ol' Rust Breath to drop by and swallow us all. It's only a 
> > testament to his sense of honor that he's proposing to help us. 
In 
> > other words, we're alone in this.

as
